value:
How might a battle between me
and the commander of the Lycian
League turn out, I wonder...

His Majesty Zephiel is the future
of Bern. That is why I saved his life.

You may place military matters
in my hands, Summoner. You are
free to take your leave.

Do not shrink away from displaying
your strength.

Swords, lances, bows... No weapon
is unfamiliar to me. But I find my axe
suits me well.

Greetings. You must be the one they
call $Nu.
I am above defeat.
Forward.

The military might of Bern is not
something to be trifled with.
Indeed.

I am Murdock, leader of the Wyvern
Generals of Bern. I serve under His
Majesty King Zephiel.

You are a mystery to me.$k$pI look at you and cannot imagine
you have the strength or ability
to seize this world.$k$pAnd yet, I see that your eyes are set
steady on the horizon and do not
waver from your goal.$k$pI've met few of whom I could say
the same. So few in fact, I can count
them on my fingers.$k$pI am watching... Do not disappoint
me, $Nu.
Do not disappoint me.
You will learn your mistake.
This is the Bern way.
I look forward to this.
Your Majesty...
I am Murdock, leader of the three Wyvern Generals of Bern. I serve under His Majesty, King Zephiel.
Hm? I have neither the time nor patience for your games.
The Bern army has no need for a man who cannot handle the consequences of his own actions.
His Majesty, King Zephiel, was almost killed by his father, the previous king. It was I who saved him.
Galle will no doubt become a powerful asset to Bern. Where he comes from is irrelevant.
Roy is here, is he? I would like to meet with him. On the battlefield.
I look forward to seeing how you fight.
Hm.
I leave it to you.
The time has come.
